description:
Reimagine winter camping. Designed to pair with Esker hot tents, this small wood stove transforms a chilly shelter into a toasty home away from home. The flat-topped design lets you cook or boil water while heating your tent.

  • Sturdy 22-gauge cold rolled steel
  • 5in. diameter stove pipe vents smoke and stows inside during transport
  • Damper and draft control on door
  • Legs provide a solid platform and fold when not in use
  • Slots on legs to stabilize stove by using poles or branches
name: Esker Huron Winter Tent Stove
